Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Relates to the certification of innovative statewide substance use disorder treatment services
Summary: Provides for the certification of entities seeking to provide in-home based substance use disorder treatment services.
LawCode: Add ยง32.05-b, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the certification of innovative statewide substance use disorder treatment services
